text: Arau yetiya sihamte sihamtara khadyasamagraira topola khulile tetiya sihamte dekhibalai pale ye, sihamtara panyamulya sihamtaka ubhata'i diya haiche. Sihamte ka’le, ‘he amara pitr! Ami arau ki pratyasa karaiba parao? Ca'omka eya ami diya panyamulya, amaka akau ubhata'i diya haiche. Ami amara paraiyalabargaka khadya-samagrai ani dima arau ami amara bhatrra raksanabeksana karaima lagate ami atiraikta arau eta utara (pithita) panya anima; e'i paraimanara sasya lai aha ati sahaja’
